long_description: Trail-worthy and spacious, the REI Lookout 40 pack handles all kinds of adventures, from done-in-a-day summit scrambles to forest hikes with the kids (and all their stuff). Updated shoulder straps and hipbelt provide a soft and ergonomic fit. Spring steel frame transfers weight to the hipbelt and stabilizes heavy loads. FreeFlow back panel provides ventilation. Panel-loading main compartment; bottom zipper. Unique water-bottle pocket design keeps bottles secure. Exterior hydration pocket. Zippered sunglasses pocket. Trekking pole attachments; front lash points. Pulley-style side compression straps. Quick-release bottom compression straps. Lightweight lash points on pack's front. Waterproof thermoplastic elastomer bottom.
short_description: Trail-worthy and spacious, the REI Lookout 40 pack handles all kinds of adventures, from done-in-a-day summit scrambles to forest hikes with the kids (and all their stuff).
